title: Ticket #4993: condor tarballs: condor.sh / condor.csh should set PYTHONPATH
description:
The condor_install script found in the binary tarballs generates condor.sh and condor.csh which need to be sourced by the user to set the environment to access the executables. However, the scripts do not set PYTHONPATH and python scripts cannot find the python bindings.

condor_install should be modified so that the generated scripts prepend "$release_dir/lib/python" (where $release_dir is the install prefix) to PYTHONPATH.
